content: {"version":2,"machineId":"0d544365-ac12-4cc3-b10a-a38552924f51","content":"{\"settings\":\"{\\n    //\\\"workbench.colorTheme\\\": \\\"Default Dark+\\\",\\n    //\\\"workbench.preferredDarkColorTheme\\\": \\\"Default Dark+\\\",\\n    \\\"workbench.colorCustomizations\\\": {\\n    \\\"editor.background\\\": \\\"#010101\\\",\\n\\t\\\"sideBar.background\\\": \\\"#080808\\\",\\n\\t\\\"tab.inactiveBackground\\\": \\\"#09090900\\\",\\n\\t\\\"sideBar.border\\\": \\\"#4d89f8\\\",\\n    \\\"tab.activeBorder\\\": \\\"#4d89f8\\\",\\n    //\\\"tab.activeBorderTop\\\": \\\"#4d89f8\\\"\\n    },\\n    \\\"yaml.schemas\\\": {\\n        \\\"file:///c%3A/Users/Soporte/.vscode/extensions/atlassian.atlascode-2.10.12/resources/schemas/pipelines-schema.json\\\": \\\"bitbucket-pipelines.yml\\\"\\n    },\\n    \\\"redhat.telemetry.enabled\\\": false,\\n    \\\"files.autoSave\\\": \\\"afterDelay\\\",\\n    \\\"[javascript]\\\": {\\n        \\\"editor.defaultFormatter\\\": \\\"esbenp.prettier-vscode\\\"\\n    },\\n    \\\"git.enableSmartCommit\\\": true,\\n    \\\"git.confirmSync\\\": false,\\n    \\\"[css]\\\": {\\n        \\\"editor.defaultFormatter\\\": \\\"esbenp.prettier-vscode\\\"\\n    },\\n    \\\"markdown-preview-enhanced.automaticallyShowPreviewOfMarkdownBeingEdited\\\": true,\\n    //\\\"editor.fontFamily\\\": \\\"Fira Code\\\",\\n    \\\"editor.fontFamily\\\": \\\"Hasklig\\\",\\n    //\\\"editor.fontFamily\\\": \\\"Victor Mono\\\",\\n    //\\\"editor.fontFamily\\\": \\\"Jetbrains Mono\\\",\\n    \\\"editor.fontLigatures\\\": true,\\n    \\\"editor.fontSize\\\": 14, \\n    \\\"editor.fontWeight\\\": \\\"350\\\",\\n    \\\"editor.autoClosingOvertype\\\":\\\"always\\\",\\n   \\\"editor.tabSize\\\": 3\\n}\"}"}
